DOC.brief_summary: This study will demonstrate if a treatment optimization program has an impact on the satisfaction with Viagra treatment in men with erectile dysfunction
DOC.brief_title: Effect Of A Treatment Optimization Program To Improve Satisfaction With Viagra
DOC.criteria: Male subjects above age of majority for whom sildenafil is prescribed for the first time within the usual practice of medicine Male subjects who have used any ED medical treatments over the last month, with the exception of testosterone and/or herbal therapies Subjects who do not have the possibility of viewing the video either through a computer, VCR or a DVD
